name: mocha-ur2ue
description: Mocha root hook plugin to convert unhandled rejection events to unhandled exceptions so that they will cause test failures.
author: Kevin Locke <kevin@kevinlocke.name>
//: All scripts should run in POSIX sh and Windows cmd.exe

scripts.postpublish: git push --follow-tags origin master && echo Remember to update GitHub Releases from CHANGELOG.md
scripts.preversion: npm run test && depcheck && david && git-branch-is master && travis-status -b master -c -w -x && appveyor-status -b master -c -w -p kevinoid/mocha-ur2ue
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-unit
scripts.version: npm run changelog && echo && echo === Please edit CHANGELOG.md as desired, then exit === && echo && $npm_config_shell && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG.md for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md
scripts.version-deps: npm install conventional-changelog-cli david depcheck git-branch-is travis-status

david.//: ESLint packages must be updated together.  Only warn about @kevinoid/eslint-config
